title: Nomady Flash Clip Light—Dark Blue
description:
The Nomaday Flash is a carefully crafted functional light, with safety and durability at the heart of its design. A sleek, wearable clip LED lamp made from aluminum, designed for high visibility thanks to its powerful 4 LED lighting modes in white or red. Rechargeable using USB-C (included), delivering 12 hours of bright, uninterrupted LED light. Perfect illumination for loved ones on the go.

  • Dimensions: 1.25 x 0.70 x 3.93 in.
  • Wearable LED lamp with clip
  • Red or white light
  • Fixed or blinking
  • IPX4 Rain resistant
  • Visible light up to 600 feet
  • 12h light time, 1.5h charging time
  • Rechargeable on USB-C port (cable included)
